items.name: Cereal puff with tomatoes

items.description: Mascarpone cheese puff garnished with sea buckthorn marmalade and crushed pistachios.

items.description: Classic croissant with cheese.

items.description: Puff pastry roll with rum and raisins.

items.description: Puff roll with cinnamon, decorated with cream cheese fudge and black sesame seeds.

items.description: Creamy whey puff with crushed hazelnuts and lemon fudge.

items.description: Puff with cheese and ham.

items.name: Cream puff
items.description: Puff pastry basket with tender baked buttercream.

items.description: Cake on almond flour with orange peel.

items.description: Biscuit muffin with natural cocoa and cherry.

items.description: Cookies with a soft layer of dark chocolate and raisins. There is one cookie in the package.

items.description: Crumbly biscuits with white chocolate chips and dried cranberries. There is one cookie in the package.

items.description: Wheat bread made by hand according to old recipes.

items.description: Rye-wheat bread on bio-sourdough.
